cells.data: The inbox and trash notebooks will not be displayed.

however there will be some special notes the page builder will be looking for in the inbox notebook

* `.home` will be displayed as the home page content
* `.footer` will be displayed as the footer on all pages.
* `.head` will replace all the contents of the html head tag with the contents of this note.
* `.sidebar` will display contents in the sidebar

override any of these for each notebook page and note pages in the notebook
